creator: hoogen
title: My $400 Ikea Ramvik Arcade Table
materials_required: 60-in-1 iCade Classic Multigame JAMMA PCB - Ver.QB
15A Arcade Switching Power Supply with Digital Display - 110W
JAMMA Full Cabinet Wiring Harness Loom
Zippy Ball Handle Joystick - Short Shaft
description: This project details the creation of an arcade coffee table using an Ikea Ramvik coffee table as a base. The table incorporates arcade controls and a screen for playing classic arcade games.
steps: Cut the monitor opening in the table top using a plunge router, creating a smaller aperture to cover the bezel and a larger one to house the monitor.
Test fit the monitor and connect it to a computer to check the display.
Connect and test all arcade parts to ensure they are working correctly.
Build a drawer with a control shelf that automatically lifts when the drawer is opened, using a chain and hinged leg mechanism.
Mount the control shelf in the drawer using hinges.
Cut holes in the control shelf for the joystick and buttons using a router.
Mount the speaker in the back of the drawer.
Install a logarithmic potentiometer for volume control on the control shelf.
Mount a full system power switch on the side of the drawer.
Mount the PCB inside the table and the power supply underneath for ventilation.
Reassemble the coffee table and test the system, making any necessary adjustments.
Sand and stain the control shelf and sand and paint the edges of the screen opening.
